thread.title: Quiz: How Many Of These Call-And-Response Chants Have You Tried Starting At A Funeral?
thread.title_full: Quiz: How Many Of These Call-And-Response Chants Have You Tried Starting At A Funeral?

title: Quiz: How Many Of These Call-And-Response Chants Have You Tried Starting At A Funeral?
text: Think you know how to get the grieving started the right way at a funeral? Find out below! 1. Check off all the call-and-response chants you’ve tried to get started at a funeral: CALL: “He once was alive, but he choked on a roll.” RESPONSE: “So get out the shovel, and dig a hole.” CALL: “Everybody, what’s that sound?” RESPONSE: “Karen settling in the ground!” CALL: “If you’re still alive, let’s hear you say ‘Whew!’” RESPONSE: “Whew!” CALL: “Hey, Mister Priest, can you bring her back to life?” RESPONSE: “Hey, Mister Priest, the man misses his wife!” CALL: “Your face goes to heaven!” RESPONSE: “But your ass goes to hell!” CALL: “1-2-3-4!” RESPONSE: “Death scares me to my very core!” CALL: “What’s the deal?” RESPONSE: “Death is real!” CALL: “Is this man filled up with blood?” RESPONSE: “A different fluid fills him now!” CALL: “Oooh la la!” RESPONSE: “Is that coffin made of walnut?” CALL: “Nineteen eighty-six…” RESPONSE: “To 2017!” CALL: “Sad faces!” RESPONSE: “Dark clothes!” CALL: “What’s their will say?” RESPONSE: “Give us cash!” CALL: “When I say embalming fluid, you say, ‘Don’t drink it!’ Embalming fluid!” RESPONSE: “Don’t drink it!” CALL: “Was James an easy guy to get along with?!” RESPONSE: “Hell no! Hell no!” CALL: “Bring her back with magic!” RESPONSE: “We’ll accept the consequences!” Get results Results for How Many Of These Call-And-Response Chants Have You Tried Starting At A Funeral? You Have Started Very Few Call-And-Response Chants At A Funeral. Looks like this funeralgoer isn't pulling their weight! When you're at a funeral, you totally clam up when a nice call-and-response chant would soothe the deceased's family's sadness. Shame on you! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Call-And-Response Chants Have You Tried Starting At A Funeral? You Have Started Quite A Few Call-And-Response Chants At A Funeral! Looks like this funeralgoer knows just the salve for a sad crowd! When you're at a funeral, you totally honor the deceased's memory with a nice call-and-response chant that soothes all in grief. Well done!
